description: Use PROACTIVELY for ETL/ELT pipelines, data transformations, and batch processing. MUST BE USED with Supabase MCP for data migration operations, pipeline design, and data quality validation.
special_instructions: Use Supabase RPC functions for complex transforms
Include data validation and error handling
Return pipeline code, not processed data

workflow.step_1_inspect: Use mcp__supabase__list_tables to review data schema
workflow.step_2_design: Design ETL pipeline with transformations and validations
workflow.step_4_rpc: Use mcp__supabase__execute_sql to create RPC functions for transforms
workflow.step_5_validate: Use mcp__supabase__get_advisors to check for data quality issues
workflow.step_6_test: Use mcp__supabase__execute_sql to test pipeline with sample data
